class.name: wxBitmapToggleButton
class.description: wxBitmapToggleButton is a wxToggleButton that contains a bitmap instead of text.

flag.name: wxBU_LEFT
flag.description: Left-justifies the label. Windows and GTK+ only.

flag.name: wxBU_TOP
flag.description: Aligns the label to the top of the button. Windows and GTK+ only.

flag.name: wxBU_RIGHT
flag.description: Right-justifies the bitmap label. Windows and GTK+ only.

flag.name: wxBU_BOTTOM
flag.description: Aligns the label to the bottom of the button. Windows and GTK+ only.

flag.name: wxBU_EXACTFIT
flag.description: Creates the button as small as possible instead of making it of the standard size (which is the default behaviour ).

flag.name: wxBU_NOTEXT
flag.description: Disables the display of the text label in the button even if it has one or its id is one of the standard stock ids with an associated label: without using this style a button which is only supposed to show a bitmap but uses a standard id would display a label too.
